title: metaQuantome 1: Data creation
questions: How do I perform functional and taxonomy analysis on metaproteomics data?
How can I perform quantitation on metaproteomics data?
How do I create inputs that can be used in metaquantome to examine differentially expressed proteins?
objectives: A taxonomy, functional and quantitational analysis of metaproteomic mass spectrometry data.
key_points: With SearchGUI and PeptideShaker you can gain access to multiple search engines
Learning the basics of SQL queries can pay off
